授業方法: Students will read and analyze paragraphs and essays, and learn or review the grammar, language, and organizational features of academic writing.  Writing will be taught as a process with attention to pre-writing, multiple draft writing, and peer-review.

第3回: Comparison-contrast paragraph: diagramming and using comparatives
第8回: Problem / solution mini-essay:  feedback and student examples; essay revisions
第9回: Writing introductions and conclusions; outlining and essay organization
第10回: Integrating outside source material; opinion essay pre-writing activities
第11回: Complete the essay introduction and conclusion paragraphs
第13回: Make final revision to the complete opinion essay

評価.教科書Required texts0: There is no required text. The instructor will provide all class materials.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: In class participation (20%), homework including draft-writing (40%), Paragraph and essay final drafts (40%)
